holidays.title: Big Forehead Day
holidays.description: Let go of those insecurities and focus on the beauty of your bold and beautiful forehead.

holidays.title: Clean Your Floors Day
holidays.description: Grab your mop and clean your floors on this Clean Your Floors Day.

holidays.title: Cloves Syndrome Awareness Day
holidays.description: Join us in raising awareness, funds, and support for patients with Cloves.

holidays.title: Makira-Ulawa Province Day
holidays.description: Discover the Makira-Ulawa province and check out fun ways to celebrate this day.

holidays.title: Mead Day
holidays.description: Get your glasses ready to drink up all things incredible about mead.

holidays.title: National Disc Golf Day
holidays.description: Celebrate America's fourth-largest sport in style, with some fun ideas we have for you.

holidays.title: National Grab Some Nuts Day
holidays.description: You won’t be surprised to hear that it’s a very nutty occasion.

holidays.title: National Jamaican Patty Day
holidays.description: Check out these awesome ideas to satisfy your Jamaican patty cravings and honor the dish too!

holidays.title: Pidjiguiti Day
holidays.description: Remember the fallen heroes of the Pidjiguiti massacre as we celebrate their invaluable sacrifice.

holidays.title: Sandcastle Day
holidays.description: Come on, let's head to the beach! It's a perfect day to build sandcastles!

holidays.title: Tom Brady’s Birthday
holidays.description: Happy Birthday to one of the most prolific and successful quarterbacks in NFL history!

holidays.title: Devon Lee Carlson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This social media star is on the right path to making a name for herself.

holidays.title: James Hetfield’s Birthday
holidays.description: Through music, there’s nothing this talented rock vocalist, guitarist, and songwriter can’t do.

holidays.title: Martha Stewart’s Birthday
holidays.description: This smart and tactical businesswoman has built a media empire around herself from scratch.

holidays.title: Tony Bennett’s Birthday
holidays.description: One lesson learned from this jazz icon is to never give up!

holidays.title: Zach Wilson’s Birthday
holidays.description: From Draper to the N.F.L., this play never stops pursuing a higher goal.
